Source

This is sample research note content extracted from the Python research note tagger application. The content demonstrates how notes are formatted and displayed when shared via the share_note function. Key features include: - Unique ID generation using SHA256 hash - Timestamp tracking - Tag categorization - URL source linking - Fuzzy search capabilities - Interactive REPL interface The application supports adding, listing, searching, importing, and exporting research notes with comprehensive command-line interface using argparse.
